title: what font is this? displays at BR
author: fezlab

comments.content: Came from nothing unfortunately. It mixes influences from [Bernhard Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020131718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/bernhard-gothic), [Drescher Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020131718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/drescher-grotesk-bt), [Guildford](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020131718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/guildford-pro)/ [Windlesham](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020131718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/windlesham-pro)/ [Relish](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020131718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/relish-pro), [FF Super Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020131718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-supergrotesk) and [Kabel](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020131718/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/kabel).
